name: Equadle
description:
27-03-2022: fixed a bug that significantly narrowed the possible range of generated equations.

===

If you encounter a bug or a behaviour that might be considered a bug - please leave the description in the comments! The game is still in early stages of development, so any feedback will be appreciated.

===

Enter correct arithmetic expressions to guess an equation. You only have 5 attempts!

Сorrectness criteria:

  • No fractional results, including intermediate;
  • No division by zero;
  • Expressions on both sides of the equals sign are equal, e.g. "(2 + 1) + (3 + 0) = 6" is a correct expression, but "(2 + 2) + (1 * 3) = 9" is not.
